subgroups.name: Hebrew0_20
subgroups.description: Short Hebrew strings with special characters. Example: 'שלום וברכה'.

subgroups.name: Hebrew0_60
subgroups.description: Medium-length Hebrew text with basic punctuation. Example: 'שלום וברכה לכל הקוראים'.

subgroups.name: Hebrew0_100
subgroups.description: Extended Hebrew text for full names. Example: 'שלום וברכה לכל הקוראים היקרים'.

subgroups.name: Hebrew0_5000
subgroups.description: Long Hebrew texts for articles or extensive content. Example: ' מאמר ארוך בעברית שמכיל תווים רבים וגם תווים מיוחדים כמו: *%\/@,?!.]*$'.

subgroups.name: ComplexHebrew5000
subgroups.description: Supports complex Hebrew texts including numeric and special characters. Example: 'טקסט מורכב עם מספרים 123 ו@#$%^&*()'.

subgroups.name: English0_20
subgroups.description: Short English strings, including basic punctuation. Example: 'Hello world'.

subgroups.name: English0_60
subgroups.description: Medium-length English text for brief descriptions. Example: 'This is a medium-length English description.'.

subgroups.name: English0_100
subgroups.description: Longer English text for full names with punctuation. Example: 'This is a longer English description for full names.'.

subgroups.name: English0_5000
subgroups.description: Extensive English texts for articles or detailed content. Example: 'This is a very long English text for articles or detailed content like:*%\/@,?!.]*$...'.

subgroups.name: ComplexEnglish5000
subgroups.description: Supports complex English texts including numeric and special characters. Example: 'Complex text with numbers 123 and @#$%^&*()'.

subgroups.name: Multilingual0_20
subgroups.description: Short multilingual strings, accommodating basic punctuation. Example: 'שלום Hello'.

subgroups.name: Multilingual0_60
subgroups.description: Medium-length text for descriptions in Hebrew or English. Example: 'שלום וברכה לכל הקוראים. Hello to all readers.'.

subgroups.name: Multilingual0_100
subgroups.description: Extended multilingual text for full names with punctuation. Example: 'שלום וברכה לכל האנשים היקרים. Hello to all dear people.'.

subgroups.name: Multilingual0_5000
subgroups.description: Extensive texts for articles or detailed content in Hebrew or English. Example: 'like:@,?!#$%^&*()_-]*$ מאמר ארוך בעברית ואנגלית שמכיל תווים רבים ומיוחדים...'.

subgroups.name: ComplexMultilingual
subgroups.description: Supports complex multilingual texts including various special characters. Example: ' like:@#$%^&*() שלום Hello 123'.
